IndexNode_824.name: vectorDB
IndexNode_824.label: Vector DB
IndexNode_824.description: Select the vector database where the vectors will be indexed.

triggerNode_1.name: credentials
triggerNode_1.label: Credentials
triggerNode_1.description: Select the credentials for Google Sheets authentication. Required to access the Google Sheet API.

triggerNode_1.name: spreadSheetLink
triggerNode_1.label: Spreadsheet Link
triggerNode_1.description: Enter the link to the Google spreadsheet you want to sync. To copy the link, click the 'Share' button in the top-right corner of the spreadsheet, then click 'Copy link'. Example value: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1hLd9Qqti3UyLXZB2aFfUWDT7BG-arw2xy4HR3D-dwUb/edit

triggerNode_1.name: sheetName
triggerNode_1.label: Sheet Name
triggerNode_1.description: Enter the name of the sheet inside the Google spreadsheet you want to sync.

variablesNode_305.name: mapping
variablesNode_305.label: Mapping
variablesNode_305.description: Map the variables with the values

vectorizeNode_177.name: embeddingModelName
vectorizeNode_177.label: Embedding Model Name
vectorizeNode_177.description: Select the model to convert the texts into vector representations.
